refsect1.title: Unit directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring units, used in unit files.

refsect1.title: Options on the kernel command line
refsect1.para: Kernel boot options for configuring the behaviour of the systemd process.

refsect1.title: Environment variables
refsect1.para: Environment variables understood by the systemd manager and other programs and environment variable-compatible settings.

listitem.para: journalctl1, localectl1, loginctl1, machinectl1, portablectl1, systemd1, systemd-analyze1, systemd-inhibit1, systemd-nspawn1, timedatectl1
journalctl1, localectl1, loginctl1, machinectl1, portablectl1, systemd1, systemd-analyze1, systemd-inhibit1, systemd-nspawn1, timedatectl1
journalctl1, localectl1, loginctl1, machinectl1, portablectl1, systemd1, systemd-analyze1, systemd-inhibit1, systemd-nspawn1, timedatectl1

journalctl1, localectl1, loginctl1, machinectl1, portablectl1, systemd1, systemd-analyze1, systemd-inhibit1, systemd-nspawn1, timedatectl1

refsect1.title: EFI variables
refsect1.para: EFI variables understood by systemd-boot7 and other programs.

refsect1.title: Home Area/User Account directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring home areas and user accounts via systemd-homed.service8.

refsect1.title: UDEV directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring systemd units through the udev database.

refsect1.title: Network directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring network links through the net-setup-link udev builtin and networks through systemd-networkd.

refsect1.title: Journal fields
refsect1.para: Fields in the journal events with a well known meaning.

refsect1.title: PAM configuration directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring PAM behaviour.

refsect1.title: /etc/crypttab and /etc/fstab options
refsect1.para: Options which influence mounted filesystems and encrypted volumes.

refsect1.title: systemd.nspawn5 directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring systemd-nspawn containers.

refsect1.title: Program configuration options
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring the behaviour of the systemd process and other tools through configuration files.

refsect1.title: Command line options
refsect1.para: Command-line options accepted by programs in the systemd suite.
